body_html:
The driver will be a problem in your case, too.
It is possible a new issue was introduced.
As we do not run continuous tests using older CUDA versions, we would not have caught it.
Again, we will welcome any contributions to fix any issues.

body:
The driver will be a problem in your case, too. 
It is possible a new issue was introduced.
As we do not run continuous tests using older CUDA versions, we would not have caught it.
Again, we will welcome any contributions to fix any issues.
